item.description:
Pine Acres is a nice little place on Route 6 in Chaplin. Please don't feel obligated to come and actually eat, you can drop in for a coffee, or just to hang out with the rest of us.

Suggested donation: $1. Members are not required to contribute money. Please do not feel that you have to give money to the group unless you can afford to do so. I pay $12 every month to keep this group going, and just like to try and get that back if I can. Lori.
item.how_to_find_us: Just ask for the meetup table.

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Brunch at Pine Acres
